name: Patroniser
description:
You are being attacked by numerous scary creatures, your only weapon is your magic wand! Use your right index finger to defend yourself.

This game was built for a stand-alone Oculus Quest 2.

Made by mrstruijk & nikruna

Made with Unity 2021.1.24

Assets used for this project:

Objects

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/free-medieval-room-131004 Free Medieval Room | 3D Environments | Unity Asset Store Elevate your workflow with the Free Medieval Room asset from Omni Studio. Find this & other Environments options on the Unity Asset Store.

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/medieval-chest-63534 Medieval Chest | 3D | Unity Asset Store Elevate your workflow with Medieval Chest asset from Jedairusz. Find this & other great 3D options on the Unity Asset Store.

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/electronics/tv-set-26193 TV Set | 3D Electronics | Unity Asset Store Elevate your workflow with the TV Set asset from Dmitriy Dryzhak. Find this & other Electronics options on the Unity Asset Store.

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/electronics/kitchen-appliance-low-poly-180419 Kitchen Appliance - Low Poly | 3D Electronics | Unity Asset Store Elevate your workflow with the Kitchen Appliance - Low Poly asset from Alstra Infinite. Find this & other Electronics options on the Unity Asset Store.

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/interior/classic-interior-door-pack-1-118744 Classic Interior Door Pack 1 | 3D Interior | Unity Asset Store Elevate your workflow with the Classic Interior Door Pack 1 asset from Jan Fidler. Find this & other Interior options on the Unity Asset Store.

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/furniture/hdrp-furniture-pack-153946 HDRP Furniture Pack | 3D Furniture | Unity Asset Store Elevate your workflow with the HDRP Furniture Pack asset from Tridify. Find this & other Furniture options on the Unity Asset Store.

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/dungeons/decrepit-dungeon-lite-33936 Decrepit Dungeon LITE | 3D Dungeons | Unity Asset Store Elevate your workflow with the Decrepit Dungeon LITE asset from Prodigious Creations. Find this & other Dungeons options on the Unity Asset Store.

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/hand-painted-textures-library-149416 Hand Painted Textures Library | 2D Textures & Materials | Unity Asset Store Elevate your workflow with the Hand Painted Textures Library asset from Ciconia Studio. Find this & more Textures & Materials on the Unity Asset Store.

Sounds

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/bard-s-tales-peaceful-harp-music-pack-lite-lite-190602 Bard's Tales - Peaceful Harp Music Pack Lite LITE | Audio Music | Unity Asset Store Layer in the sounds of Bard's Tales - Peaceful Harp Music Pack Lite LITE from Mythago Music for your next project. Browse all audio options on the Unity Asset Store.

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/destructive-force-free-action-music-205757 Destructive Force (Free Action Music) | Audio Music | Unity Asset Store Layer in the sounds of Destructive Force (Free Action Music) from Muz Station Productions for your next project. Browse all audio options on the Unity Asset Store.

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/44-1-general-library-free-sample-pack-145873#content 44.1 General Library (Free Sample Pack) | Audio Sound FX | Unity Asset Store Layer in the sounds of 44.1 General Library (Free Sample Pack) from InspectorJ Sound Effects for your next project. Browse all audio options on the Unity Asset Store.
